Wondrous item (wine), common
The white glass of this bottle of sweet, dark red wine is made from the sand found along the banks of the elvish river. It contains enough for six servings. A creature who drinks a serving of this wine may speak and understand Aquan for 1 hour. Creatures who drink more than one serving within 24 hours must make a successful DC 12 Constitution saving throw or become incapacitated for 1d4 hours.
